articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: SARS treatments could help with the new coronavirus. Why were they shelved?

articles.author: Erika Fry
articles.title: The coronavirus picture gets clearer with updated infection, death numbers
articles.description: Updated numbers and analysis from China's CDC provide a more nuanced picture of coronavirus infections and deaths.

articles.author: Bernhard Warner
articles.title: Frustrations fly as MWC trade show customers seek refunds following last-minute cancelation
articles.description: The coronavirus outbreak caused the abrupt cancellation of the world's biggest telecoms trade show, Mobile World Congress, leaving the host city in a lurch about refunds.

articles.author: kdunn6
articles.title: In China, oil won’t be the only energy sector battered by the coronavirus
articles.description: Energy consultancy Wood Mackenzie says the virus' impact on Chinese supply chains has already snarled production for renewable energy infrastructure

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: The safe haven sector that’s tearing past tech stocks and the S&P 500 this year
articles.description: The coronavirus outbreak has been disrupting global markets for the past month, sinking energy stocks and significantly boosting shares in utilities.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: Coronavirus recovery: Why it’s so hard for China’s factories to get back to work
articles.description: Apple manufacturer Foxconn has to check employees for fever twice a day while other factories impose 14-day quarantines for returning staff.
